newsitem.title: USA: PureTec sees $4.8 mln Q4 charge.
newsitem.headline: PureTec sees $4.8 mln Q4 charge.

text.p: PureTec Corp said Friday it expects to record a one-time, fourth quarter charge of about $4.8 million, related to the shutdown of unprofitable facilities in its recycling unit.
These charges are in addition to $3.1 million in write-offs taken in the first half of fiscal 1996 for discontinued manufacturing operations, PureTec said.
PureTec said it expects its fiscal 1996 operating results will compare favorably to fiscal 1995 pro-forma operating losses of $0.70 a share.
Although the charges will result in a loss for fiscal 1996, PureTec expects its operating EBITDA to be about $40 million.
PureTec, a leading garden hose manufacturer, said it is "poised" for earnings growth in 1997 and beyond.
